sourcesContent:
Calculadora de CDB

Taxa CDI: {{ taxaCDI }}%

Taxa Banco: {{ taxaBanco }}%

Valor Final do CDB: {{ valorFinal | currency:'BRL' }}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', }) export class HomeComponent { taxaCDI: number = 0.9; taxaBanco: number = 108; valorInicial: number = 0; meses: number = 0; valorFinal: number | null = null; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { } calcular(): void { const url = `https://localhost:7123/api/calculocdb/calcular?valorInicial=${this.valorInicial}&meses=${this.meses}`; this.http.get(url).subscribe((response: any) => { this.valorFinal = response.valorResgate; }); } }
